options.content:
Terraform Agent Dashboard

Metrics collected via OpenTelemetry

targets.expr: avg by (job_id, job_type, workspace_name, agent_id, agent_pool_id) (max_over_time(tfc_agent_core_profiler_memory_used_percent{job_type=~"$job_type", workspace_name=~"$workspace", agent_pool_id=~"$agent_pool_id"}[$__range]))

panels.description: Memory usage statistics across all agents
panels.title: Memory Usage Statistics

panels.description: CPU usage statistics across selected agents
panels.title: CPU Usage Statistics

panels.description: I/O throughput statistics across all agents
panels.title: I/O Throughput

targets.legendFormat: Agent Pool {{agent_pool_id}} - Max Heap In Use
Agent Pool {{agent_pool_id}} - Max Heap from OS
Agent Pool {{agent_pool_id}} - Median Heap In Use

panels.description: Memory usage for the selected agent
panels.title: Selected Agent Memory Usage

panels.description: CPU usage for the selected agent
panels.title: Selected Agent CPU Usage

panels.description: I/O statistics for the selected agent
panels.title: Selected Agent I/O Throughput

panels.description: Various Go runtime metrics to help understand runtime behavior
panels.title: Selected Agent Go Runtime Stats
